NGỌC (TRẦN) 
Le Van Sy Street, Ward 12, District 3, HCMC 
OBJECTIVE 
 
Get more successful and promotion in professional and international environment. 
 
A long-term career with your company which will offer a variety of challenges and opportunities, 
whereas my abilities and skills can be fully utilized and developed.  
WORKING EXPERIENCES  
2/2019 – Present  
REMOTE RESOURCES CO, LTD (IT offshore) 
Recruitment Manager 
 
Manage full recruitment process to meet internal and external staffing goals 
 
Build, implement and improve all recruitment related processes & procedures 
 
Define and set the strategy for meeting the recruiting demand for the workforce in coordination 
with the Manager Department and ensure that it is in line with the company’s business strategy 
 
Participate in the creation of and refine the Company Recruitment Plan 
 
Collaborate with key leadership on profile development, and supply and demand planning to 
meet overall business objectives including monitoring the recruiting pipeline against key 
performance indicators and adjusting the plan if necessary 
 
Participate in and monitor strategic recruitment projects and initiatives 
 
Ensure that the recruiting systems are current and used effectively and efficiently 
 
Lead the creation of a recruiting and interviewing plan for each open position 
 
Make sure all open positions are fulfilled timely and on budget 
 
Develop a pool of qualified candidates in advance of need 
 
Responsible for all recruitment advertising including liaising with outside agencies, professionals 
and clients as and when appropriate 
 
Sourcing channels development 
 
Provide line management support and supervision to members of the Recruitment Team 
 
Develop the recruitment team by delivering appropriate training and coaching to members 
 
Ensure required weekly, monthly, annual recruitment reports: recruitment status, cost, etc. 
 
Provide other reports as requested by CEO 
3/2018 – 10/2018     
MONROE CONSULTING GROUP 
Senior Executive Consultant (Consumer Goods) 
 
Be head-hunting candidates for prestigious client base (multinationals and large companies).  
 
Develop own client base within one of the specialized division though business development.  
 
Involved in the complete recruitment process together with the clients.  
 
Assess each candidate’s suitability for a job opening through thorough pre-screening and 
interviewing before proposing them to clients.  
 
Involved in negotiating pay and salary rates and finalizing arrangements between clients and 
candidates. 
 
Build long-lasting business relationships with both clients and candidates whilst reaching targets.  
 
Develop own Industry knowledge while getting involved in social media and networking activities. 
1/2017 – 12/2017   
KOSAIDO HR Co LTD  
Team Manager (Manufacturing, IT) 
 
CEO asked me to come back to support KOSAIDO’ team for short time.  
 
Lead 3 members in my team.  
9/2014 – 9/2016  
HARVEY NASH VIET NAM CO., LTD 
Senior Executive Consultant (Manufacturing, Sales & Marketing) 
 
Responsible for delivering high quality service to clients and candidates; 
 
Promote & build awareness of our company capabilities to an existing client or prospective client;  
 
Work with client companies, find out about their business, their culture, their current and future 
recruitment needs, and to develop a loyal business relationship with them;  
 
Attract quality candidates through preparing job descriptions/postings, screening and short listing 
applicants; as well as by networking, headhunting and through referrals;  
 
Screen and interview candidates in accordance with company standards 
 
Organize interviews for candidate as requested by the client;  
 
Ensure the recruitment speed and results of the assigned vacancies are efficient to turn around 
time and candidate’s qualifications;  
 
Provide advice to both clients and candidates on salary, training and career progression;  
 
Follow up on leads for permanent recruitment provided by other staff members ;  
 
Review recruitment policies to ensure effectiveness of selection techniques and recruitment 
programs; 
 
Perform other tasks assigned by manager/director. 
1/2013 – 8/2014  
KOSAIDO HR CO., LTD 
Senior Consultant 
Marketing/ sales: 
• Search the project in order to find the potential clients who would like to use HR’s services 
• Contact with clients in order to introduce company’s services 
• Meeting with clients in order to explain clearly company’s services and persuade them using 
this service. 
Head hunting: 
 
Search the candidates base on our client’s requirement from many sources such as the 
company’s database, vietnamworks, career builder, careerlink … 
 
Attract quality candidates through preparing job descriptions/postings, screening and short 
listing referrals 
 
Screen and interview candidates in accordance with company standards 
 
Organize interviews for candidate as requested by the client 
 
Follow up interview process 
 
Ensure the recruitment speed and results of the assigned vacancies are efficient to turn 
around time and candidate’s qualifications 
 
Provide advice to both clients and candidates on salary 
 
Making invoice when the recruitment success. 
 
Managing candidates’ data and update new information into company system. 
9/2011 – 12/2012  
SAIGONVIEW RESIDENCES 
Receptionist 
 
To welcome and check-in all guests according to established procedures. 
 
To assign rooms and prepare key Card and folders for all arriving guests and Groups. 
 
To provide information and assistance to all guest. 
 
To assist Reservations & Sales Department in taking reservation after office hours. 
 
To attend to guests complaints promptly and then report to FO Manager for follow up. 
 
To check out guests according to established procedures, and ensure all payment or 
vouchers are collected. 
 
Organize tour if they require such as Ho Chi Minh City tour, Cu Chi tour, even another city or 
province. 
 
Receive and transfer information among departments. 
 
To provide currency exchange service for guests. 
 
To ensure that all guests charges are posted into the right guest accounts. 
 
To balance all, the daily posting transactions and ensure monies collected are banked into 
the General Cashier’s safe at the end of each shift. 
 
And finally, try my best to make the most satisfied guest. 
ACADEMIC ACHIEVEMENTS 
2008 - 2011 
SaigonACT College  
  The Degree of Associate Hospitality Management major.
